content.question: The source best supports which of the following claims about Harlem Renaissance poets?

choices.label: They sought to express the importance of a liberal arts education.
They sought to celebrate the achievements of other Black artists.
They sought to counter negative stereotypes of Africa.
They sought to support the ideas of the Back to Africa movement.

content.answer: They sought to counter negative stereotypes of Africa.

topic.text: 3.13: Envisioning Africa in Harlem Renaissance Poetry
